title: 1325ft2 - Newly Remodeled Single House for Rent
posting_body: Newly Remodeled (NEW Wood floor, NEW Kitchen, NEW Bathroom, NEW Bedrooms, NEW Furnace, NEW Hot water Tank, NEW Windows, NEWER Roof, A/C)cozy & private 2 Bed/2 Bath single house (with fenced yard) for rent in Detroit area.
All the rooms have ceiling fans.
Every room & hallway is equipped with closets.
It has a porch at the entrance, another porch on the driveway.
It also has a NEW shed for additional storage in the yard.
Excellent & family friendly neighborhood, easy access to the shopping and one block away from Detroit High School.
Nice and spacious backyard that can be used for entertainment and children play.
